RR.description: Sum of daily total precipitation amount.

RRm.description: Mean of daily total precipitation amount.

RR1.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 1 mm.

R10mm.long_name: Number of heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 10 mm)
R10mm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 10 mm.

R20mm.long_name: Number of very heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 20 mm)
R20mm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 20 mm.

R25mm.long_name: Number of super heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 25 mm)
R25mm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 25 mm.

RYYmm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above {thresh} mm.

DD.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation below {thresh} mm.

CDD.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive dry days (precipitation < {thresh} mm)
CDD.description: Maximum number of consecutive days with daily total precipitation below {thresh} mm.

CWD.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
CWD.description: Maximum number of consecutive days with daily total precipitation equal or above {thresh} mm.

DSf.description: Total number of series of at least {window} consecutive days with precipitation below {thresh} mm.

DSn.long_name: Total number of days in dry spells (precipitation < {thresh} mm)
DSn.description: Total number of days in series of at least {window} consecutive days with precipitation below {thresh} mm.

DSx.long_name: Maximum lenght of dry spells (precipitation < {thresh} mm)
DSx.description: Longest series of at least {window} consecutive days with precipitation below {thresh} mm.

WSf.description: Total number of series of at least {window} consecutive days with precipitation above {thresh} mm.

WSx.long_name: Maximum lenght of wet spells (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
WSx.description: Longest series of at least {window} consecutive days with precipitation above {thresh} mm.

WSn.long_name: Total number of days in wet spells (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
WSn.description: Total number of days in series of at least {window} consecutive days with precipitation above {thresh} mm.

SDII.long_name: Annual mean precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
SDII.description: Annual mean total precipitation amount of days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm.

RX1day.description: Maximum total precipitation amount occurring within 1 day.

RXYYday.description: Maximum total precipitation amount occurring within {window} days.

RYYpABS.long_name: Total precipitation amount with precipitation > {per}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RYYpABS.description: Annual total precipitation amount of days with precipitation above the {per}th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm.

RYYp.long_name: Number of days with precipitation > {per}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RYYp.description: Number of days with daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm) > {per}th percentile during reference period) (days).

RYYpTOT.long_name: Precipitation fraction with precipitation > {per}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RYYpTOT.description: Fraction of days with precipitation above the {per}th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm.

RRYYp.long_name: {per}th percentile of daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RRYYp.description: {per}th percentile of daily total precipitation amount on days with total precipitation about or equal {thresh} mm.

PRCPTOT.long_name: Total precipitation amount of wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
PRCPTOT.description: Sum of daily total precipitation amount on days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm).

FD.long_name: Number of frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
FD.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC.

CFD.long_name: Number of consecutive frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
CFD.description: Number of consecutive days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC.

LFD.long_name: Number of late frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
LFD.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC between {start_date} and {end_date}.

ID.long_name: Number of ice days (maximum temperature < 0 degC)
ID.description: Number of days with daily maximum temperature below 0 degC.

SU.long_name: Number of summer days (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
SU.description: Number of days with daily maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

CSU.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive summer days (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
CSU.description: Maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

TR.long_name: Number of tropical nights (minimum temperature > {thresh} degC)
TR.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature above {thresh} degC.

SQI.long_name: Number of uncomfortable sleep events (minimum temperature > {thresh} degC)
SQI.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature above {thresh} degC.

HD17.long_name: Cumulative heating degree days (mean temperature < 17 degC)
HD17.description: Cumulative sum of temperature degrees for daily mean temperature below 17 degC.

GD.long_name: Number of growing degree days (mean temperature > {thresh} degC)
GD.description: Cumulative sum of temperature degrees for daily mean temperature above {thresh} degC.

CSDI.long_name: Cold spell duration index (days within periods >= {window} consecutive days with minimum temperature < 10th percentile)
CSDI.description: Number of days within periods of at least {window} consecutive days with minimum temperature below the 10th percentile.

WSDI.long_name: Warm spell duration index (days within periods >= {window} consecutive days with minimum temperature > 90th percentile)
WSDI.description: Number of days within periods of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above the 90th percentile.

CHDYYx.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive heat days (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
CHDYYx.description: Maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

TG90p.long_name: Fraction of days with mean temperature > 90th percentile
TG90p.description: Fraction of days with mean temperature above the 90th percentile.

TX90p.long_name: Fraction of days with maximum temperature > 90th percentile
TX90p.description: Fraction of days with maximum temperature above the 90th percentile.

TN90p.long_name: Fraction of days with minimum temperature > 90th percentile
TN90p.description: Fraction of days with minimum temperature above the 90th percentile.

TG10p.long_name: Fraction of days with mean temperature < 10th percentile
TG10p.description: Fraction of days with mean temperature below the 10th percentile.

TX10p.long_name: Fraction of days with maximum temperature < 10th percentile
TX10p.description: Fraction of days with maximum temperature below the 10th percentile.

TN10p.long_name: Fraction of days with minimum temperature < 10th percentile
TN10p.description: Fraction of days with minimum temperature below the 10th percentile.

FG.description: Mean of daily mean wind speed.

FGx.description: Maximum of daily mean wind speed.

FGn.description: Minimum of daily mean wind speed.

FX.description: Mean of daily maximum wind speed.

FXx.description: Maximum of daily maximum wind speed.

FXn.description: Minimum of daily maximum wind speed.

CW.long_name: Number of cold and wet days
CW.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature below the 25th percentile and total daily precipitation amount above the 75th percentile.

CD.long_name: Number of cold and dry days
CD.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature below the 25th percentile and total daily precipitation amount below the 25th percentile.

WW.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature above the 75th percentile and total daily precipitation amount above the 75th percentile.

WD.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature above the 75th percentile and total daily precipitation amount below the 25th percentile.

DTR.long_name: Mean diurnal temperature range (difference between maximum and minimum temperature)
DTR.description: Mean diurnal temperature range (difference between daily maximum temperature and daily minimum temperature).

HSf.long_name: Number of hot spells (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
HSf.description: Total number of series of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

HSx.long_name: Maximum length of hot spells (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
HSx.description: Longest series of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

HSn.long_name: Total number of days in hot spells (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
HSn.description: Total number of days in series of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

CSf.description: Total number of series of at least {window} consecutive days with temperature below {thresh} degC.

CSx.long_name: Maximum length of cold spells (temperature < {thresh} degC)
CSx.description: Longest series of at least {window} consecutive days with temperature below {thresh} degC.

CSn.long_name: Total number of days in cold spells (temperature < {thresh} degC)
CSn.description: Total number of days in series of at least {window} consecutive days with temperature below {thresh} degC.

SD.long_name: Number of days with snow above {thresh} mm
SD.description: Number of days with solid precipitation flux above {thresh} mm (liquid water equivalent).

SCD.long_name: Number of days when the snow depth is greater than or equal to {thresh} cm
SCD.description: Number of days with snow depth at or above {thresh} cm.

Sint.long_name: Mean snowfall during days with snowfall > {thresh} mm
Sint.description: Mean snowfall flux above {thresh} mm (liquid water equivalent).

Sfreq.long_name: Percentage of days with snowfall flux > {thresh} mm
Sfreq.description: Snowfall intensity is derived by dividing the total number of days with snowfall > {thresh} mm (liquid water equivalent) by the total number of days within the analysed time period.

UTCI.description: UTCI is the equivalent temperature for the environment derived from a reference environment and is used to evaluate heat stress in outdoor spaces.

WI.long_name: Number of winter days (minimum temperature < {thresh} degC)
WI.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature below {thresh} degC.

HWf.long_name: Number of heat waves (maximum temperature > {thresh_tasmax} degC and minimum temperature > {thresh_tasmin} degC)
HWf.description: Total number of serires of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh_tasmax} degC and minimum temperature above {thresh_tasmin} degC).

HWx.long_name: Maximum length of heat waves (maximum temperature > {thresh_tasmax} degC and minimum temperature > {thresh_tasmin} degC)
HWx.description: Longest series of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh_tasmax} degC and minimum temperature above {thresh_tasmin} degC).

HWn.long_name: Total number of days in heat waves (maximum temperature > {thresh_tasmax} degC and minimum temperature > {thresh_tasmin} degC)
HWn.description: Total number of days in series of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh_tasmax} degC and minimum temperature above {thresh_tasmin} degC).

GSS.description: Calendar day of year, when the temperature exceeds {thresh} degC for at least {window} consecutive days.

GSE.description: Calendar day of year, when the temperature is below {thresh} degC for at least {window} consecutive days.

FFS.long_name: Frost free season start (minimum temperature >= {thresh} degC)
FFS.description: Calendar day of year, when the temperature exceeds {thresh} degC for at least {window} consecutive days.

FFE.long_name: Frost free season end (mean temperature < {thresh} degC)
FFE.description: Calendar day of year, when the temperature is below {thresh} degC for at least {window} consecutive days.
